about_the_game:
Pilgrim's Progress: Chapter One - The Forbidden Forest (Demo)


Step into the shoes of Christian, the protagonist of John Bunyan's timeless allegory, in this captivating demo of Pilgrim's Progress. Experience the first chapter, "The Forbidden Forest," where players embark on a perilous journey through a dark and mysterious forest filled with challenges and spiritual trials.

Note: This demo version includes only the first chapter, "The Forbidden Forest," offering a glimpse into the larger adventure that awaits. Players can experience the initial leg of Christian's epic pilgrimage, filled with spiritual trials and profound lessons. This demo serves as an introduction to the rich narrative and engaging gameplay of the full Pilgrim's Progress game, inviting players to delve deeper into the complete story upon its full release.
